title: Find all CloudFront Distributions where default root object is configured
query:
select
  -- Required Columns
  arn as resource,
  case
    when default_root_object = '' then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when default_root_object = '' then title || ' default root object not configured.'
    else title || ' default root object configured.'
  end as reason,
  -- Additional Dimensions
  region,
  account_id
from
  aws_cloudfront_distribution
